content: witch version a-2 january 7 2007 materials needed -any worsted weight yarn i used fisherman s wool main color mc 1 ounce / contrasting color cc small amount -g hook or hook needed to obtain gauge -stuffing of your choice this can be wool roving polyester fiberfill fabric scraps of yarn…use your imagination -tapestry needle gauge 4 5 sts and 4 5 row per inch in single_crochet body nd round 1 w/ mc chain 2 8 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in ea st around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 32 single_crochet round 5 working in the back loops only chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch 32 single_crochet rnds 6-7 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 28 single_crochet round 9 repeat round 6 round 10 chain 1 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 11 repeat round 6 round 12 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 20 single_crochet round 13 repeat round 6 round 14 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 15 repeat round 6 round 16 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet round 17 repeat round 6 finish off stuff w/ filling of your choice copyright © 2005 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is for the personal use of the buyer only no part of this pattern may be reproduced adapted 6 round 19 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 20 repeat round 6 round 21 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 20 single_crochet round 22 repeat round 6 round 23 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet stuff w/ filling of your choice hat round 24 w/ mc working in the back loops only repeat round 6 join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 25 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet rnds 26-27 repeat round 6 then stuff w/ filling
